column4: Tourism;Sihanoukville: Two boats have crashed off Koh Rong Samloem coast at 6.20 pm on November 27
column6: ------16 foreign tourists were on one boat when it hit another
column8: who has not been identified was killed. Other people from the boat were pulled out from the water.------The victim has know been identified as 35-year-old Romanian man CIUCA BOGDAN-MIHAIL.------(Link contains blurred images of deceased)------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/390651
